segments.text: ORG ! It must be so late where you are . What time is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: nope , actually I was waiting for you . I have something big to tell you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have an offer to work for a company in your city today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't believe it ! Is it real ? You're moving here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven't accepted the position yet and with the upcoming holiday I think it's the perfect chance to visit the city and take a good look at the company before deciding . If you have time I think we c
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: just give me the dates and I'll make sure I'm free . You know after all these chatting online , it will be great to meet you in real life . I look forward to seeing you soon !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: me too . But I think I am going to bed now . my head is getting heavy . Have a nice day there !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: thanks . This is so exciting . Sleep tight and sweet dreams !
segments.speaker: S1
